titles.title: A resolution to improve congressional oversight of the intelligence activities of the United States.
A resolution to improve congressional oversight of the intelligence activities of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: Replaces provisions establishing in the Senate Appropriations Committee a Subcommittee on Intelligence with new provisions that: (1) give the Subcommittee exclusive jurisdiction over all funding for the National Intelligence Program (NIP); (2) direct the Subcommittee to approve for full Committee consideration an annual appropriations bill for the NIP; and (3) provide Subcommittee membership and staff.
